dictionary.definition: A man who aggressively pursues his self interests, particularly when it comes to sex, with little regard for others.
A fetish for being confined to a small space. This often manifests as a sub being locked in a cage, box, or a closet.
A vagina wedgy. Also, the impression of a woman’s vagina as seen through tight pants.
A fetish for showing off your partner, or images of him/her, to others.
The receiving partner during anal sex. Usually refers to the bottom in a gay couple.
A fetish for having catheters inserted.
The removal of the testicles or ovaries, often to prevent fertility and/or to reduce the effects the hormones produced by these glands have on behavior.
A multi-tailed whip, often used in fetish play.
The brand name for an injectable drug used to stimulate an erection.
A private room in a strip club that can be rented out for extended periods of time.
Engaging in sexual activity with someone who will get far more out of the experience than you will.
A medieval device that forcibly guards a woman's virginity.
A woman’s virginity. More specifically, the hymen, which is often ruptured during vaginal penetration.
